descriptionHtml:
[b]This is my first follower mod please don't hurt me lol and sorry for my terrible English[/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Voice :[/size][/color] Female Even Toned
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Body :[/size][/color] CBBE (Probably she is ok with other body mods please try and tell me)
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Weight :[/size][/color] 50 
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Default Weapon :[/size][/color] Steel Sword,Banded Iron Shield,Bow
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Default Armor :[/size][/color] Leather set without helmet
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Location : [/size][/color]Jorrvaskr 
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Combat Style :[/size][/color] Combat Warrior 1h
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Perks:[/size][/color] Shieldwall(20),Deflect Arrows,Armsman(20),Agile Defender(20)
She is  [color=#0000ff][size=5]marriageable[/size][/color] and [color=#0000ff][size=5]protected[/size][/color]
She is ok with AFT (Probably other follower modes ok) and i try her with 100+ mods and still ok (4 hours)
If you have a problem with AFT please load before AFT esp in your game.(Exam:Skyrim-Update bla bla bla Freja.esp-Amazing Follower Tweaks.esp)

[color=#ff0000][size=5]-Download-[/size][/color]
Simply drag&drop your DATA folder.(Be sure esp file is active)
author: RolloTheBerserker
